changeSet.author: Vishnu

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN( 'Charge Virale - Value(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Charge Virale - Log(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Créatinine(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'GPT(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'CD4(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Glycémie(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'TDR - Malaria(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Crag sérique(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Syphilis(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Hépatite B(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (LCR - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (Ascite - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (Urine - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (Synovial - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (Crachat - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert TB (LCR - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (Pleural - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (Pus - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (Ganglionnaire - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Genexpert (Gastrique - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Globules Blancs(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Globules Rouges(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Hemoglobine(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Hematocrite(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'VGM(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'CCMH(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'Plaquettes(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'MXD% (Eosino+Monocytes - Bilan de routine IPD)', 'NEUT%(Bilan de routine IPD)') and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All_Tests_and_Panels'));

changeSet.comment: Adding All Tests and Panels to All_Tests_and_Panels set

changeSet.author: Vishnu
changeSet.comment: Adding Tests to Bilan à l’admission - IPD Samples
